component:ember-mapbox-composer/componen.title: LayersComponent
component:ember-mapbox-composer/componen.text: Renders a collection of Mapbox Composer-compatible layer groups. // routes/application.js import Route from '@ember/routing/route'; export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route { async model() { return [{ id: 'roads', layers: [{ id: 'highways', style: { type: 'line', paint: { 'line-fill': 'orange', }, }, }, { id: 'streets', style: { type: 'line', paint: { 'line-fill': 'blue', }, }, }] }]; } }  {{!-- routes/application.hbs --}} {{#labs-map as |map|}} {{map.labs-layers layerGroups=model}} {{/labs-map}}

attributes.name: LayersComponent
attributes.description:
Renders a collection of Mapbox Composer-compatible layer groups.

// routes/application.js
import Route from '@ember/routing/route';

export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route {
  async model() {
    return [{
      id: 'roads',
      layers: [{
        id: 'highways',
        style: {
          type: 'line',
          paint: {
            'line-fill': 'orange',
          },
        },
      }, {
        id: 'streets',
        style: {
          type: 'line',
          paint: {
            'line-fill': 'blue',
          },
        },
      }]
    }];
  }
}

{{!-- routes/application.hbs --}}
{{#labs-map as |map|}}
  {{map.labs-layers layerGroups=model}}
{{/labs-map}}

arguments.name: map
arguments.description:
Reference to a instance of a MapboxGL map. Handled internally when using contextual components:

  {{#labs-map as |map|}}
{{map.labs-layers layerGroups=model}}
  {{/labs-map}}

arguments.name: interactivity
arguments.description: Whether layergroups should have interactivity (highlighting and clicking). Useful for temporarily disabling interactivity during drawing mode.

arguments.name: onLayerClick
arguments.description: Event fired on layer click. Scoped to individual layers. Returns the mouse event and clicked layer.

arguments.name: onLayerMouseMove
arguments.description: Event fired on layer mousemove. Scoped to individual layers. Returns the mouse event and found layer.

arguments.name: onLayerMouseLeave
arguments.description: Event fired on layer mouseleave. Scoped to individual layers. Returns the mouse event and found layer.

arguments.name: onLayerHighlight
arguments.description: Event fired on layer highlight. Returns the id of the layer that is being highlighted.

arguments.name: toolTipComponent
arguments.description: Name of local component to use in place of default component.

arguments.name: highlightedFeatureLayer
arguments.description: MapboxGL Style object for the hightlighted layer

component:ember-mapbox-composer/componen.title: LabsLayersTooltipComponent
component:ember-mapbox-composer/componen.text: Renders a component when a "tooltipable" layer is hovered.  // routes/application.js import Route from '@ember/routing/route'; export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route { async model() { return [{ id: 'roads', layers: [{ id: 'highways', tooltipable: true, style: { type: 'line', paint: { 'line-fill': 'orange', }, }, }, { id: 'streets', tooltipable: true, style: { type: 'line', paint: { 'line-fill': 'blue', }, }, }] }]; } } {{!-- routes/application.hbs --}} {{#labs-map as |map|}} {{#map.labs-layers layerGroups=model as |layers|}} {{#layers.tooltip as |tip|}} This text appears over the tooltipable layer on mouseover. Yields a hash with two properties: - {{tip.feature}} - {{tip.layer}} {{/layers.tooltip}} {{/map}} {{/labs-map}} Behavior can be overridden with a different component by passing the name of a local component to labs-layers.

attributes.name: LabsLayersTooltipComponent
attributes.description:
Renders a component when a "tooltipable" layer is hovered. 

// routes/application.js
import Route from '@ember/routing/route';

export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route {
  async model() {
    return [{
      id: 'roads',
      layers: [{
        id: 'highways',
        tooltipable: true,
        style: {
          type: 'line',
          paint: {
            'line-fill': 'orange',
          },
        },
      }, {
        id: 'streets',
        tooltipable: true,
        style: {
          type: 'line',
          paint: {
            'line-fill': 'blue',
          },
        },
      }]
    }];
  }
}
{{!-- routes/application.hbs --}}
{{#labs-map as |map|}} 
{{#map.labs-layers layerGroups=model as |layers|}}
  {{#layers.tooltip as |tip|}}
    This text appears over the tooltipable layer on mouseover. Yields a hash with two properties:
     - {{tip.feature}}
     - {{tip.layer}}
  {{/layers.tooltip}}
{{/map}}
{{/labs-map}}

Behavior can be overridden with a different component by passing the name of a local component to labs-layers.

arguments.name: offset
arguments.description: Offset of tooltip div element in pixels.

arguments.name: top
arguments.description: Top offset of tooltip div in pixels.

arguments.name: left
arguments.description: Left offset of tooltip div in pixels.

arguments.name: feature
arguments.description: Geographic feature of the layer that is hovered when onLayerMouseMove is fired.

arguments.name: layer
arguments.description: Layer that is hovered when onLayerMouseMove is fired.

component:ember-mapbox-composer/componen.title: LabsMapComponent
component:ember-mapbox-composer/componen.text: Extends mapbox-gl component to yield labs-layers contextual component. Allows passage of layer-groups. // routes/application.js import Route from '@ember/routing/route'; export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route { async model() { return this.store.query('layer-group'); } }  {{!-- routes/application.hbs --}} {{labs-map layerGroups=model}}

attributes.name: LabsMapComponent
attributes.description:
Extends mapbox-gl component to yield labs-layers contextual component. Allows passage of layer-groups.

// routes/application.js
import Route from '@ember/routing/route';

export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route {
  async model() {
    return this.store.query('layer-group');
  }
}

{{!-- routes/application.hbs --}}
{{labs-map layerGroups=model}}

arguments.name: layerGroups
arguments.description: Collection of layer-group models (see: DS.RecordArray). Allows optional meta object with a mapboxStyle property which is passed to the mapbox-gl instance.

component:ember-mapbox-composer/componen.title: LabsMapLegendComponent
component:ember-mapbox-composer/componen.text: DEPRECATED  Opinionated handler for created map legends. Expects a layerConfig object with an items property. items are an array of objects specific the SVG attributes of the legend item. // controller/application.js import Controller from '@ember/routing/controller'; export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route { legendConfig = { "label":"Street Lines", "items":[ { "type":"line", "label":"Mapped Street", "tooltip":"Tooltip information!", "style":{ "fill":"none", "stroke": "rgba(50, 50, 50, 1)" } }, { "type":"line", "label":"Street Treatment", "tooltip":"Tooltip information!", "style":{ "fill":"none", "stroke":"rgba(84, 84, 84, 1)", "stroke-width":"0.5" } }, ] } } {{labs-map-legend model=legendConfig}}

attributes.name: LabsMapLegendComponent
attributes.description:
DEPRECATED

Opinionated handler for created map legends. Expects a layerConfig object with an items property. items are an array of objects specific the SVG attributes of the legend item.

// controller/application.js
import Controller from '@ember/routing/controller';

export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route {
  legendConfig = {
    "label":"Street Lines",
    "items":[
      {
        "type":"line",
        "label":"Mapped Street",
        "tooltip":"Tooltip information!",
        "style":{
          "fill":"none",
          "stroke": "rgba(50, 50, 50, 1)"
        }
      },
      {
        "type":"line",
        "label":"Street Treatment",
        "tooltip":"Tooltip information!",
        "style":{
          "fill":"none",
          "stroke":"rgba(84, 84, 84, 1)",
          "stroke-width":"0.5"
        }
      },
    ]
  }
}
{{labs-map-legend model=legendConfig}}

template:application-tailwind.title: Your Tailwind styles
template:application-tailwind.text: Your Tailwind styles A reference for every generated class in your app.

template:docs/index.title: What is Mapbox Composer?
template:docs/index.text: What is Mapbox Composer? Mapbox Composer is an Ember addon created by NYC Planning Labs on the shoulders of Ember Mapbox GL and Mapbox. Mapbox Composer makes it easier to implement and maintain a large number of Mapbox GL layers by providing: A simple data structure called a layer-group Data models for binding state to Mapbox GL and storing state on a server A {{labs-layers}} component for rendering layer groups What is a layer-group? A layer-group is a simple schema for grouping together Mapbox GL layers. Mapbox GL itself does not have a native API for grouping layers. Mapbox's style specification is highly customizable, but it also requires creating multiple style layers for the same data source. For example, to create a world map with national boundaries, you need to create one style layer for the lines and another style layer for the fills. This addon groups layers into single objects that can be manipulated as needed. Once loaded, layer groups are available from the data store. They can be manipulated at any point, with data bindings properly set up. This means you can, for instance, toggle the visibility of a particular layer-group, and it will manage the internals of delegating visibility to those layers.

template:docs/quickstart.title: Getting Started
template:docs/quickstart.text: Getting Started This guide will help you get started with Ember Mapbox Composer. After completion you will have a collection of layer-groups visible on a map. Installation Install the addon: ember install ember-mapbox-composer Install Mapbox GL: yarn add mapbox-gl Get a map into your template Add mapbox-gl to the ENV object in config/environment.js: 'mapbox-gl': { accessToken: '', map: { style: 'https://layers-api-staging.planninglabs.nyc/v1/base/style.json', }, }, Add the labs-map component to application.hbs {{labs-map id="map"}}This will render a map with the environment’s base style. (Remember to give #map a height in your CSS.) Get Layer Groups into the Ember data model Add host to the ENV object, pointing to the Labs Layers API: host: 'https://layers-api-staging.planninglabs.nyc', Generate an application adapter if it does not exist: ember g adapter application Set up adapters/application.js to query to the Layers API: import DS from 'ember-data'; import fetch from 'fetch'; import config from '../config/environment'; const { host } = config; const { JSONAPIAdapter } = DS; export default class ApplicationAdapter extends JSONAPIAdapter { host = host; namespace = 'v1'; async query(store, type, query = {}) { const URL = this.buildURL(type.modelName); return fetch(`${URL}`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', }, body: JSON.stringify(query), }).then(blob => blob.json()); } } Generate an application route if it does not exist: ember g route application In routes/application.js define which layer groups will be queried from the API: async model() { const layerGroups = await this.store.query('layer-group', { 'layer-groups': [ { id: 'subway', visible: true }, { id: 'floodplain-efirm2007', visible: true }, ], }); return { layerGroups, } } Render Layer Groups on the map Add labs-layers component to the map:{{#labs-map id='map' as |map|}} {{map.labs-layers layerGroups=model.layerGroups}} {{/labs-map}}
